about_the_game:
HUMANKIND: Music for the Ages albums features hours of traditional music from the game’s soundtrack. Volume 7 includes the 22 new tracks from the DLC “Together We Rule”, performed by Dimitar Gougov. Produced by Arnaud Roy.

[This is a music album for you to listen outside the game / You don’t need this music DLC to have access to the music in the game]
22 tracks. 41 mn. Includes MP3 and FLAC files.
detailed_description:
HUMANKIND: Music for the Ages albums features hours of traditional music from the game’s soundtrack. Volume 7 includes the 22 new tracks from the DLC “Together We Rule”, performed by Dimitar Gougov. Produced by Arnaud Roy.

[This is a music album for you to listen outside the game / You don’t need this music DLC to have access to the music in the game]
22 tracks. 41 mn. Includes MP3 and FLAC files.
